Name: Sunken
About the game: Ahoy Matey's! Take t' th' high seas wit' yer wits about ye, Fight endless hoards o' scallywags all on one screen, sharpen yer teeth on th' blades o' yer fallen foes. Sunken be action an packed retro pirate game fer th' cot pvp crowd! Y'arrrr! Shiver me timbers Fast Paced Explosive Gameplay. One Hit Kills. Canon Balls Can Be Caught In Mid Air. Up to 12 Players Local Multiplayer. Endless hours of high seas, high stakes, pirate battle fun. Shoot at other pirates Dash t' block cannonballs Pickup floatin' cannonballs Find ye booty!
Meta Title: Sunken: Jun 28, 2018, Trevor Madge and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sunken? Check out the release date (Jun 28, 2018), developer insights from Trevor Madge, and a complete game summary.
